entities.name: half-blood prince
entities.description: The Half-Blood Prince is someone who used to go to Hogwarts and invented spells, including Levicorpus. He wrote spells all over his old Potions book.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry has the Half-Blood Prince's old Potions book and is trying to learn more about him.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin knew of the Half-Blood Prince and remembered his spells being used at Hogwarts.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape was targeted by Harry's father using Levicorpus spell.

relationships.description: Harry has the Half-Blood Prince's old Potions book.
